keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map , visitPreviousTab
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map é Marks.activateGotoMode swap
map ` Marks.activateGotoMode swap
map m Marks.activateCreateMode swap
map öö moveTabLeft
map üü moveTabRight
map <a-ö> moveTabLeft count=99
map <a-ü> moveTabRight count=99
map <a-<> moveTabLeft count=99
map <a->> moveTabRight count=99
map q< closeTabsOnLeft
map qö closeTabsOnLeft
map q> closeTabsOnRight
map qü closeTabsOnRight
map qq closeOtherTabs
map <c-q> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map R reload hard
map e LinkHints.activateMode action=hover
map úú goNext
map őő goPrevious
map <c-ú> passNextKey
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
